post.title: EKA Solutions

card.content: Sadly I knew when starting that my time would be limited as a contractor and I am going to miss all the great people. I’m sure we will continue to see each other well into the future

post.intro:
Developer

Making the move to Australia was a big leap and had me coming out without my family to find a place to live and work. Being able to join the eka team working on their commodity management platform was such a great opportunity. Sadly I knew when starting that my time would be limited as a contractor and I am going to miss all the great people. I’m sure we will continue to see each other well into the future, we have become good friends and you have been a great introduction into Australia and the workforce.

Having a chance to work with Viterra in understanding how the grain is traded was very insightful.

content.alt: Work colleagues at eka after our monthly meeting

content.content:
Responsibilities:

  • Talking to clients and understanding their requirements

  • Working with BA’s to incorporate new changes

  • Updating existing applications

  • Server / Workstation setups

Experience Gained

  • 6 Months Development experience in:

    Languages:

    • C# .NET

    • ASP .Net MVC

    • Java Script

    • HTML5

    • CSS3

    • SQL

  • Tools:

    • Knockout js

    • Dev Express

    • MS Team Foundation Server (TFS)

    • MS Test

    • Entity Framework

    • Visual Studio

    • Microsoft SQL Server

    • Team Foundation Version Control

    • Object Orientated programming (OOP)

    • Team Foundation Testing tools

  • Systems Analysis

  • Database Design and Development (SQL Server)

  • Server side programming and implementation

  • Business integration

  • Project management methodologies and skills
